title: Gentlemen! v1.3 [PD]
description:
2 Players, One Screen: Gentlemen!

A Victorian era head-to-head arcade battle for tablets - 7 inches and up! 
Take on your friends in this frantically paced duel game. 

Knives, bombs, homing pigeons - choose your weapon wisely, and master the art of the gravity flip. An honorable duel, a dapper delight - GENTLEMEN!

**8/10 on Edge!** **4.5/5 on Touch Arcade!** **4.5/5 on 148 Apps!** **9/10 on PocketGamer!**

You'll need to hone a delicate balance of technique, knowledge, cunning, and blind panic (just like a real duel!). You'll also need a friend - two players, one screen. If you don't have a friend, go and get one.

What's New: (Updated : Aug 19, 2013)

v1.3:
bunch of new play modes!
fixes crash affecting some users when updating the app.
readjusted pigeon timing
crate numbers tweaked a bit

More info:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.luckyframe.gentlemen" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
